publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4574 Jamie Hepburn: Cumbernauld College Students Head Off to Special Olympics—That the Parliament congratulates the seven students from Cumbernauld College who are heading to Leicester this summer to compete at the Special Olympics; notes that this is an outstanding achievement for all the athletes involved in their chosen sports; wishes Marianne Keenan, Caroline Fraser, Russell Keddie, Debbie Sinclair, Nicola Keppie, Alan Reilly and Karen Lyttle the very best of luck when competing for gold, and notes that with determined fundraising they shall be successful in raising the £240,000 that is required to send the athletes to Leicester. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Aileen Campbell*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Kidd*, Anne McLaughlin*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Trish Godman*, Sandra White*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-4574 Cumbernauld College Students Head Off to Special Olympics (lodged on 7 July 2009) Jack McConnell*
